name: Phobos VR
description:
Snakes? Spiders? Heights? Whatever your fear is, Phobos will help you deal with it. Evidence shows being exposed to your phobia helps it go away. By adding levels and different environments, Phobos VR provides a "safe" place to face your phobias from the comfort of your room. We even have a 'panic button' to transport you away, if it's ever too much for you! 

Currently we have arachnophobia developed, with many more phobias to come!

Currently built for Oculus Rift only.
